import React, { useState } from 'react' function MenuConstructor({data}) { // receives data and constructs the table const [current,setCurrent] = useState("/") let page = document.URL let notDrink = page.slice(-5).toUpperCase() let nameField = page.endsWith("/")?"DRINKS":notDrink setCurrent(nameField) return ( <>
{current} Price (â‚¬) Add Remove
) } export default MenuConstructor /* { data.map((item)=> {current==="BOOKS"?item["title"]["S"]:item["name"]["S"]} {current==="DRINKS"?item["size"]["S"]:current==="BOOKS"?item["author"]["S"]:null} {item["price"]["N"]} ) } */
